    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs

      Subinterfaces of YamcsService in org.yamcs 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ProcessorService
      This interface has to be implemented by all services that run as part of a processor.
      interface  TmPacketProvider 
      interface  YamcsService
      Deprecated. 
      Classes in org.yamcs that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProcessorCreatorService
      Used in yamcs.instance.yaml to create processors at yamcs startup
      class  ProcessRunner
      Global service that launches and supervises a configured program or script.
      class  StreamTcCommandReleaser
      Sends commands to yamcs streams
      class  StreamTmPacketProvider
      Receives packets from yamcs streams and sends them to the Processor/TmProcessor for extraction of parameters.

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.alarms

      Classes in org.yamcs.alarms that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlarmReporter
      Generates alarm events for a processor, by subscribing to all relevant parameters.

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.algorithms

      Classes in org.yamcs.algorithms that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlgorithmManager
      Manages the provision of requested parameters that require the execution of one or more XTCE algorithms.

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.api

      Classes in org.yamcs.api that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractYamcsService 

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.archive

      Classes in org.yamcs.archive that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlarmRecorder
      Records alarms.
      class  CommandHistoryRecorder
      Records command history the key is formed by generation time, origin and sequence number the value is formed by a arbitrary number of attributes
      class  EventRecorder
      Sets up the archiving of the events coming on events_realtime and events_dump streams into the yarch table events.
      class  IndexServer
      Handles index retrievals and tags
      class  ParameterRecorder
      ParameterRecorder Records (processed) Parameters The base table definition is DataLinkInitialiser This records parameters as tuples - good for realtime recording but not very efficient for retrieval of a few parameters over long time periods.
      class  ReplayServer
      Yarch replay server A note about terminology: we call this replay because it provides capability to speed control/pause/resume.
      class  XtceTmRecorder
      Records XTCE TM sequence containers.

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.artemis

      Classes in org.yamcs.artemis that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractArtemisTranslatorService
      takes data from yamcs streams and publishes it to artemis address
      class  ArtemisCmdHistoryService
      Takes cmd history data from yamcs streams and publishes it to artemis address (reverse of ArtemisCmdHistoryDataLink)
      class  ArtemisEventService
      Takes event data from yarch streams and publishes it to artemis address (reverse of ArtemisEventDataLink)
      class  ArtemisPpService
      takes Parameter data from yarch streams and publishes it to hornetq address (reverse of ArtemisParameterDataLink) To avoid a ping-pong effect: it creates a queue with a filter on hornet side it remembers a thread local version of the tuple in transition on yarch side
      class  ArtemisServer
      Server wide service that initialises and starts the artemis/hornetq server
      class  ArtemisTmService
      Takes TM data from yamcs streams and publishes it to ActiveMQ Artemis address (reverse of ArtemisTmDataLink)

      This is responsible for "releasing" a prepared command.

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.http

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpServer
      Server wide HTTP server based on Netty that provides a number of Yamcs web services: REST API WebSocket API Static file serving

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.parameter

      Subinterfaces of YamcsService in org.yamcs.parameter 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ParameterProvider
      interface implemented by all the classes that can provide parameters to the ParameterRequestManager.
      Classes in org.yamcs.parameter that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocalParameterManager
      Implements software parameters - these are parameters that can be set from the clients.
      class  SystemParametersCollector
      Collects each second system processed parameters from whomever registers and sends them on the sys_var stream
      class  SystemParametersProvider
      Deprecated.

      The parameter archive stores data in partitions -> intervals -> segments.

      Classes in org.yamcs.tctm that implement YamcsService

      Service that initialises all the data links

      Provides telemetry packets and processed parameters from the yamcs archive.

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.tctm.cfs

      Classes in org.yamcs.tctm.cfs that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CfsEventDecoder
      Generate Yamcs events out of cFS event packets The packets are filtered by message id (first 2 bytes of the header)

    • Uses of YamcsService in org.yamcs.xtceproc

      Classes in org.yamcs.xtceproc that implement YamcsService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XtceTmProcessor
      Does the job of getting containers and transforming them into parameters which are then sent to the parameter request manager for the distribution to the requesters.
